long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shein to Woo - Effortlessly Import Shein Products to WooCommerce

Shein to Woo is a powerful browser extension designed to help you seamlessly export product listings from the Shein website into CSV format, ready for direct import into your WooCommerce store. With just a few clicks, you can transfer essential product information—including names, descriptions, prices, and images—from Shein to your WooCommerce store, significantly enhancing your product management efficiency.

Extension Features
- One-Click Export: Easily export product information from any category page on Shein.
- Automatic Data Retrieval: The extension captures all products displayed on the current page, with support for automatic pagination.
- CSV Format: The exported data is saved in CSV format, making it compatible for direct import into WooCommerce.
- Pause and Resume: You can pause and resume the export process at any time.
- Local Data Privacy: All data is stored exclusively on your local machine, ensuring privacy and security as it never passes through our servers.

How to Use
1. Open Shein: Navigate to any product listing page on the Shein website.
2. Click the Button: Click the "Export to Woo" button located in the browser toolbar to start capturing the product information from the current page. A pop-up window will display the progress of the data retrieval, allowing you to pause or resume as needed.
3. Download CSV: Once the export is complete or paused, click the "Download Items" button to save the data as a CSV file.
4. Import to WooCommerce: Log into your WooStore’s admin panel, go to the product management section, and select the import feature. Upload the CSV file you just saved to successfully import the products into your store.

The Shein to Woo Extension provides WooCommerce store owners with a revolutionary way to import products, greatly improving workflow efficiency. With just a few simple steps, you can quickly bring popular Shein products into your store, helping you stay ahead of the competition and boost sales. We invite all WooCommerce store owners to download and use this Extension to breathe new life into your online shop!

Privacy Policy
Your data remains exclusively on your local machine, ensuring privacy and security, as it never passes through our servers.

Disclaimer
This extension is an independently developed product by ExtensionsBox and has no association with SHEIN LLC.
